Body:
if c3 is None:
    c3 = c2
    diff = c3 - c1
    c2 = c1 + np.array([0, diff[1]])
self.edge = c2 - c1
self.height = np.linalg.norm(self.edge)
self.edge *= 1.0 / self.height
self.cross = np.array([-self.edge[1], self.edge[0]])
self.length = np.dot(self.cross, c3 - c1)
self.lengthSign = np.sign(self.length)
self.length = np.abs(self.length)
c3 = c2 + self.lengthSign * self.cross * self.length / np.linalg.norm(self.
    cross)
c4 = c3 - c2 + c1
self.corners = [c1, c2, c3, c4]
return c3, c4
